description: Thai style salmon burgers are fragrant and light, something different for burger night.
name: Thai Style Salmon Burger Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Add the salmon to a food processor and pulse to a paste. Add the breadcrumbs, curry paste, half the mayonnaise, coriander, garlic and ginger and lime zest and blitz until smooth. Pour into a bowl and stir through the spring onions. Shape into 4 patties and place in the fridge for 1 hour to firm up.
In a small bowl, whisk the remaining mayonnaise with the sweet chilli sauce and lime zest.
Using a vegetable peeler, slice the carrot and cucumber lengthways to form long ribbons. Steep in the lime juice along with the finely sliced red onion and set aside.
Drizzle oil in a large non-stick pan on medium heat and cook the fish cakes until crisp and golden, 4-5 minutes on each side.
Place the burgers in the wholemeal buns and top with sweet chilli mayonnaise, vegetable ribbons and red onions and serve.
